name: Deathless (DallOner)
description:
A game for wild lovers of hardcore! Defeat all bosses without having to start again... Dungeons have bugs that significantly improve gameplay.

Controls:
Arrows to Moves, X to Attack and Z to Jump
Pads to Moves, A to Jump and B to Attack.

Supported Xbox 360 Game Controller

PD: I report a bug with the final boss in HTML5 port, this does not make the attack sequence. We are fixing this problem, download the compressed for better experience.

Credits:
DallOner Paolo - Programming & Level Design.
Roman "Darwol" Mata - Art & Animations.
Jonathan Gonzalez - Music & Efx.
